survey_name: Online Freelancer Financial Management Practices Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the financial management practices and challenges faced by online freelancers, including budgeting, tax preparation, and income tracking.

questions.question_text: How often do you track your freelance income and expenses?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale for clarity. Mobile-friendly design recommended.

script.question_text: How often do you track your freelance income and expenses?

questions.question_text: Which tools or methods do you use to manage your freelance finances? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field if selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Add open-text follow-up if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which tools or methods do you use to manage your freelance finances? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your biggest challenge when managing your freelance finances?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What is your biggest challenge when managing your freelance finances?

questions.question_text: How prepared do you feel for tax season as a freelancer?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice Likert scale question. Ensure options are balanced.

script.question_text: How prepared do you feel for tax season as a freelancer?

questions.question_text: Do you set aside a portion of your income for taxes?
answer_options: No, I pay taxes as a lump sum
No, I don't set aside money for taxes

script.question_text: Do you set aside a portion of your income for taxes?
answer_options: No, I pay taxes as a lump sum
No, I don't set aside money for taxes
